mapper.update:
update tb_tijianinfo
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idcard_num = #{idcardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hearthcard_num = #{hearthcardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard_phtoto = #{idcardPhtoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
person = #{person,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_num = #{deptNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tj_id = #{tjId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_tijianinfo set number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idcard_num = #{idcardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hearthcard_num = #{hearthcardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_phtoto = #{idcardPhtoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person = #{person,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_num = #{deptNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tj_id = #{tjId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update tb_tijianinfo set status=#{status} where number = #{number}
mapper.select: select count(tj_id) from tb_tijianinfo where date(create_time)=#{createtime}
select count(tj_id) from tb_tijianinfo where create_time=#{monthdate} or create_time>#{monthdate}
SELECT create_time,COUNT(create_time) FROM tb_tijianinfo GROUP BY date(create_time) ORDER BY tj_id DESC LIMIT 0,5
SELECT number,hearthcard_num FROM tb_tijianinfo GROUP BY tj_id desc LIMIT 0,1
select * from tb_tijianinfo where date(create_time)>=#{daytime} group by tj_id desc
select status from tb_tijianinfo where idcard_num=#{idnum}
select count(tj_id) from tb_tijianinfo where status=0
select count(tj_id) from tb_tijianinfo where status=1
select count(tj_id) from tb_tijianinfo where status=2
